price: But Allah will save those who fear Him, for they have attained salvation[18]; no harm will touch them, nor will they grieve.
arabic: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: [18] i.e., they succeeded in the trials of the life of this world and the attainment of Paradise.
